comments.body:
I have verified that this bug was introduced after adding RefreshControl support in 6.2.0.

The Android "RefreshLayout" Java class (which is now a parent of Titanium's TableView and ListView views) ignores the Android "WRAP_CONTENT" setting for height (ie: Titanium's Ti.UI.SIZE setting).

-PR (master):-  https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/9421

_Edit: PR closed in favor of another PR. See comment below._

This is a pretty bad bug I think. When I compile my app in any 6.2.x version the ListView is rendered unusable because all of the auto-height items take up tons of extra space. I'm hoping that PR can be merged soon - thanks!

FR Passed for both master & 6.3.0 backport.
PR's merged.

[~lchoudhary], the fix for this on master has been moved to...
PR (master): https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/9513

Verified the fix in SDK  7.0.0.v20171023120246 & 6.3.0.v20171018084007.

Closing.
